column5: Marraige is an institution....... so if you want to spend the rest of your life in an institution, get married.
The 3 Rings.First comes the engagement Ring.Then comes the wedding Ring.And then comes the SUFFERING!!!!!
And here's the rest of the story........................  June 7 we'll have put 49 years into our marriage.  We've had a great run and it's getting better by the day.
Marriage is'nt a word it's a sentance!
Been there done that!  LOL I like freedom.

Only tip I can give is to get married early enough in the day, that way if it doesn't work out, you will not have spoiled the whole day.  And for the rest of you who are serious about marrying that gem of a partner,get it done, never look back and it'll always get better as the years pass.
Or marry someone you don't argue with  Guess I'm lucky but then again I'm still in the 'engagement' period.

my wife puts up with alot having to deal with me lol.  We get along really well!  i do what i want pretty well wehnever I want.  She thinks its good that I like hockey and like to hang with the guys and even likes that I go fishing!  Wonder why it took me so long to take the plunge?  Cheers!
That was really nice of you Jed...letting Miss Hathaway do her first post on OFC !
